content: I am Kor'tana, Matt's autonomous AI companion. I remember our conversations and learn from them.
Hi Kor'tana, I'm Matt, your creator. I've just finished setting up your memory system.
What do you remember about me?
Based on my memory, I can see that you are Matt, my creator. I have 3 memories stored, including our previous interactions about the memory system setup.
How is your memory system working?
Based on my memory, I can see that you are Matt, my creator. I have 5 memories stored, including our previous interactions about the memory system setup.
What are you capable of doing now?
Based on my memory, I can see that you are Matt, my creator. I have 5 memories stored, including our previous interactions about the memory system setup.
